dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Jerry West [mailto:jwest@webmarketingnow.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2006 9:45 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: support@theplanet.com
Subject: FW: Copyright Infringement



I have sent this to abuse@theplanet.com with no resolve. I will forward this
to my attorney in 24 hours if this issue is not taken care of.

 

  _____  

From: Jerry West [mailto:jwest@webmarketingnow.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 07, 2006 3:49 PM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Subject: Copyright Infringement

 

Good afternoon,

 

My name is Jerry West, owner of Web Marketing Now. I have a copyright
infringement issue that could be described as pretty humorous.

 

Your customer's domain: www.mayidasoft.com <http://www.mayidasoft.com/> 

Our domain: www.webmarketingnow.com <http://www.webmarketingnow.com/> 

 

Now, what makes this humorous is how I caught these guys. They not only
copied my design, but kept many of the internal links to our site (which
were absolute), but the worst was that they actually kept our web stat
tracking code, so they showed up in our referral logs.

 

I am requesting that this site be taken down due to this obvious violation.
I hope you can comply as soon as you pick yourself up off the floor from
laughing for how stupid these people were.

 

Much thanks,

 

Jerry West

Web Marketing Now
